players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked by the sudden turn of events last night. We need to stay calm and focus on finding out who among us could have committed this heinous act."

Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
